name: laravel_resource_controller
title: Laravel Resource Controller Pattern
description: A standard Laravel controller pattern that implements basic CRUD operations for a resource. Each controller follows the same structure with index() for listing all records and store() for creating new records with validation.
content:
<?php

namespace App\Http\Controllers;

use App\Models\{ModelName};
use Illuminate\Http\Request;

class {ModelName}Controller extends Controller
{
    public function index()
    {
        ${model_variable} = {ModelName}::all();
        return view('{view_prefix}.index', compact('{model_variable}'));
    }

    public function store(Request $request)
    {
        $validated = $request->validate([
            {validation_rules}
        ]);

        ${singular_variable} = {ModelName}::create($validated);
        return redirect()->route('{route_prefix}.index');
    }
}
